website_summaries.verdict: Although this wallet won't hold as many cards, documents, and other items compared to others on our list, it's worth considering for consumers that prefer a slim profile.
pros: Stands out from other travel wallets on our list for ultra-thin build that fits nicely in pockets, bags, and more
Has RFID blocking technology and a passport slot
Made of genuine leather in choice of dark blue, gray, and red
cons: Has a fraction of the pockets as others we considered

customer_reviews.title: very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality wallet, the leather and stitching are beautiful. I bought it to organize my passport, boarding pass and other papers while traveling. I just returned from 3 weeks of international travel and it kept me organized.
customer_reviews.author: kellyo

customer_reviews.title: Great size for sports jackets
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the right size for a boarding pass and other baggage tracking documents, and was just want I wanted for carrying around paperwork that can get crumpled in pockets. It also has a slots for ID and passport, so they can all be in one place while moving around in the airport. Its slim enough to slip in and out of my pocket easily, and the leather looks great. I'm not a huge fan of the contrasting stitching, but no other product came close without being far most costly, and its a minor complaint. I'd definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected, the material is very soft, stiching is high quality. The pockets are great size wise. I used it to store the papers for my car in such as duplicate license, registration, proof of insurance. It holds every thing I need in one spot. It’s also red, so that makes it easy to see/find in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: The Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel document holder.
customer_reviews.text: I immediately filled this with our travel docs for an upcoming trip. Easily holds 2 passports, boarding docs, reward cards and trip insurance paperwork! Plus it is really classy looking! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne R. Mcnaughton

customer_reviews.title: It needs a security strap so that documents font fall out in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I use it for every trip I take and I love how slim it is because I can just slid it in my purse and I can always reach for it easily
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice in my hands. It's a good, bright shade of red, so it'll be easy to find in my bag when going through the airport. My husband will be using it for a trip at the end of this month, I will update this review then. At first glance, it looks and feels like a quality product
customer_reviews.author: Spokanada

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for trAvel documents
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my passport and documents. Won’t have to go rummaging through my purse to find my necessary travel documents
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: I do like this product very much; my companion piece.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for holding my lottery tickets, some credit cards and my Cross pen, a nice companion, however, it is indeed very long, holds the tickets and slips very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Doe

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love this passport wallet! It holds my passport, boarding cards and other documents all in one place while traveling. Very convenient to use!
customer_reviews.author: Stormy-gail

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my trip to Europe. I was able to fit my passport, tickets, bank card and cash. It’s slim enough that my bag didn’t feel bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Pavone

customer_reviews.title: Very nice texture. Holds my passport
customer_reviews.text: Very nice texture. Holds my passport, license, two credit cards, and boarding pass with ease. It’s a lot easier to pull this out at the airport rather than pulling your boarding pass then looking for your passport.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: This can hold 2 passports and is a very practical help.
customer_reviews.author: puppitypup

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I really like the gray leather and will be perfect for holding passport and boarding pass so nothing gets lost during travel
customer_reviews.author: Frank Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and slim fits everything I need to travel I bought more of these for gifts this is two thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Passport sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and we’ll made. Passport, ID and airlines info fit well. Needs a month to air out because of chemical smell. Softens with use.
customer_reviews.author: e cali mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have something the right size to hold my passport and boarding documents.
customer_reviews.author: Chirdes

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very slim and lightweight, I use to to hold my medical documents in my purse
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lebel

customer_reviews.title: Functionality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling. Keeps everything you need - cash, passport and a few cards - all in an RFID protected wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel wallet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for organizing travel documents. Very slim, lightweight and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Texgirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very convenient to have my passport and boarding pass in one folder.
customer_reviews.author: Lina Todd

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow
customer_reviews.text: This passport holder is just a little bit too narrow for anything I try to put in it. My passport spine goes past the midsection of the holder and my cards when put into the slot get bent when the holder is closed. The feel, color, and slimness is nice but the design makes it a pain to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

product_meta.title: Pacer Go RFID Blocking Slim Minimalist Long Travel Wallet Genuine Leather Passport Holder Travel Cover with Passport Holder Slot, Cash Slot, Card Slot, Boarding Pass (Dark Blue)
product_meta.description:
Color:Dark BlueThis slim minimalist long passport holder made out of top layer cowhide leather with RFID blocking function which protect your cards from unauthorized scanning. 

It contains a cash slot, a boarding pass slot, a card slot and passport holder slot which helps you organized all your essential items during your trip.
feature_bullets: RFID Protection:The Pacer Go leather passport holder wallet comes equipped with RFID blocking capability to prevent thieves from scanning and stealing valuable info. It protects the frequency of credit cards, debit cards, passports, and ID cards. By blocking unauthorized RFID scans, the wallet helps keep personal info safe from thieves and offers peace of mind.

High Quality Leather - Made of top-layer cowhide genuine leather, the Pacer Go passport cover feels soft to the touch, looks nice and holds up over time. The leather passport wallet features durable construction with high-quality stitching for reliable strength.

Interior Organize - The Pacer Go passport holder features 4 interior slots: 1 for passport, 1 for bording pass or air tickets 1for cash and 1 for credit card. The large pockets on the left accommodate unfolded air ticket, while the full length vertical pockets on the both sides provides a tight fit for the back cover of a passport.
Compact Size: 8.5" x 4" x 0.25" - With its slim, compact design, the Pacer Go genuine leather RFID blocking passport wallet makes a reliable and convenient passport holder for any savvy traveler.

Utility - A great choice for international travel. The wallet offers not only handsome aesthetics, but also practical functionality. It keeps essentials organized, neatly stored and easy to access. The leather travel wallet provides an overall high-quality look and feel, plus user friendly features, slim and sleek, beyond that of a typical passport wallet.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars48 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
